metadata.title: Type of Flash used in RA MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
What type of Flash is used in RA MCUs?
Answer:
Renesas RA MCUs use two kinds of flash memory:
1) MF3 Code Flash double access type. Two Code Flash are controlled at the same time. (64-bit I/O).
2) RV40 Phase 2 .
In terms of register control and usage, MF4 is the same as MF3. So we currently have RV40F (proprietary) which is excellent for high flash density devices. MF3 / MF4 is excellent for low leakage / very low power consumption applications.
More information on Block configuration and similar topics is available here: https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/flash-memory-programming
  Suitable Products
RA
